description: Essential phrases for transportation, navigation, hotels, and travel needs

phrases.english: How do I get to the airport?
phrases.exampleSentence: Atsiprašau, kaip patekti į oro uostą? Ar yra autobusas?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Excuse me, how do I get to the airport? Is there a bus?

phrases.lithuanian: Ar šis autobusas važiuoja į centrą?
phrases.english: Does this bus go to the center?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar šis autobusas važiuoja į centrą? Kiek kainuoja bilietas?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Does this bus go to the center? How much does a ticket cost?

phrases.exampleSentence: Atsiprašau, aš esu pasiklydęs. Ar galite parodyti žemėlapyje?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Excuse me, I am lost. Can you show me on the map?

phrases.exampleSentence: Kur yra autobusų stotis? Ar toli eiti pėsčiomis?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Where is the bus station? Is it far to walk?

phrases.english: Do you have any rooms available?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar turite laisvų kambarių šiai nakčiai? Dviem asmenims.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Do you have any rooms available for tonight? For two people.

phrases.lithuanian: Kiek kainuoja taksi į oro uostą?
phrases.english: How much does a taxi to the airport cost?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kiek kainuoja taksi į oro uostą? Ar yra fiksuotas tarifas?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: How much does a taxi to the airport cost? Is there a fixed rate?

phrases.english: Can you call a taxi for me?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite iškviesti man taksi? Reikia nuvykti į ligoninę.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can you call a taxi for me? I need to go to the hospital.

phrases.english: Where can I rent a car?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kur galiu išsinuomoti automobilį? Ar reikia tarptautinio vairuotojo pažymėjimo?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Where can I rent a car? Do I need an international driver's license?

phrases.english: When does the last train leave?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kada išvyksta paskutinis traukinys į Kauną? Ar dar spėsiu?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: When does the last train to Kaunas leave? Will I still make it?

phrases.english: Is this far from the center?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar tai toli nuo centro? Ar galima nueiti pėsčiomis?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is this far from the center? Can you walk there?
